data.message: Hi FB, I got an unknown button named "traffic information" in the bottom left to the Chat, what's that thing? When I opened it, I didn't understand anything in it! And when I refresh the Page, it went off and disappears..

replies.message: It appears again, when I click on it, a tab named "Network routing and load balancing information" shows up! Are you trying to spy on me or something?

Hi Anis. Sorry you're experiencing issues with error messages. This sounds like a bug. Can you please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? http://on.fb.me/19Qly4B -Natalie
Hi FB I cant chat with my friend When I look her accont her accont close
